topics.body:
Ok, I just got back from seeing Godzilla (yeah yeah, I know, what a fucking slowpoke.)

Anyways I like it, but it has enough problems that I can't blame anyone for disliking it.

[spoiler]To begin with I am enough of a Godzilla fan to know that in most of his movies it takes awhile for the G-man to show up and start wrecking shit, but the stuff that wasn't Godzilla being awesome was fucking stupid, bland and aside from Brian Cranston everyone seemed to be phoning it in.

The not Cranston/giant monster characters were about as interesting as a block of cement and literally the only reason I remember that the main character was named Ford is because unless your last name is Prefect that is a goddamn stupid fucking name.

Finally this movie is a fucking tease. Awesome monster fight at the Honolulu airport? Ha! Nope, we're back to the bland, generic ass fucking family. One of the MUTO's wrecking Vegas? Yeah that would be cool, we'd better cut that out and only show you other character's watching it on some grainy monitors instead.

That said when Godzilla does show up to throw down shit gets goddamn awesome really goddamn fast. If I may get obscene for a moment, my pants exploded due to the boner Godzilla's roar caused, and I pretty much came when he used his atomic fire breath.

Seriously, this movie is worth a watch at least once and I really hope we get more stuff like it.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

Evos? That's a new one.

I love the good old "how can you be moral without god?" argument because it says way more about the person making the argument than it does about atheists. Essentially its people saying that without God telling them not to, or in this case without the threat of eternal torture, that they would in fact be a murdering pedophile rapist.
